name: Clone Invaders (Juice_Baby)
description:
A fun little space invaders clone with an added twist and a lot more satisfaction.

Music and Sound by JTB_Games: https://jtb-games.itch.io/

Help on special effects by Pop: https://popdoesart.itch.io/

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated :)

Controls

- A and D to move left and right

- W and S to move forward and backwards

- Press space to fire or to eat a nearby enemy (red circle over enemies in range)
